title: ECS (Error Correction System) Inspector - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: The ECS Inspector is used to inspect and maintain UDRs and batches located in ECS, to view and edit their content, and to add them to different Reprocessing Groups. The latter is a prerequisite for the data to be collected by an ECS Collection Agent. Open Example of forwarding and collection of UDRs from ECS
